page.title: 08Shopping In Newburgh
page.content: In this area there are only three shops.Mace Line,Marshalls and Reid Brothers.Mace Line is a grocery shop selling a wide variety of goods. It also has a Post Office within the shop.The building dates back to 1899.The present owners have been there for 22 years and there has been a Post Office for 40 years.Marshalls is also a grocery shop and has recently been taken over by new owners.Both shops also sell daily newspapers.Reid Brothers is a butcher shop selling meat, fruit and vegetables.These three shops provide the local community with a handy service. Many of the local people shop in the bigger supermarkets in Ellon and the superstores in Aberdeen when buying their weekly shopping.Aberdeen is also the centre for all other goods.
